Interview with Chad Fowler

Posted by nicholas

The Ruby on Rails Podcast has yet another interview, this time with the great Chad Fowler, author of My Job Went To India.

Chad’s in charge of organizing this year’s RailsConf, (along with Rich Kilmer) so do run over and have a listen.
